class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 27 - June 29, 2024. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: FREN 381 is a special course number reserved for certain courses taken in Paris with the EDUCO/ Sciences Po study abroad programs through Emory College and with the Emory in France Summer Program. May be used to count toward the major in French Studies.
sections: Class Nbr: 1428, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: S. Descourtis, Status: Open
